Title: Apple Will Not Reinstate Epic’s Fortnite Developer Account, but Epic’s Other Developer Accounts Remain Active
Description: Accounts that have never been disabled include the accounts for Rocket League (a game whose Mac support [Epic discontinued in January 2020][rl]), and separately, Unreal Engine. My understanding is that none of those accounts are affected by Apple’s decision not to reinstate the Fortnite developer account.

Title: Azure Functions runtime 4.0 is now in public preview  | Azure updates | Microsoft Azure
Description: Azure Functions 4.0 includes support for .NET 6.

Title: Samoa Scraps Daylight Saving Time (DST)
Description: Samoa scraps Daylight Saving Time (DST) and will not set their clocks forward one hour in September.

Title: Bringing OAuth 2.0 Flow to Wrangler
Description: In this blog, we will look into what the OAuth 2.0 protocol is, and how it can help improve the authorization process in the command-line interface tool Wrangler used to manage your Cloudflare Workers.

Title: Customer Support & Help Center
Description: Browse American Express US Customer Service Topics in our Online Help Center to learn how to create your account, confirm your card, dispute a charge and more.

Title: Bankrupting Fraud Virtual Summit by Arkose Labs
Description: Join the largest fraud and abuse prevention event of the year, with an amazing lineup of speakers including Brian Krebs, Troy Hunt, Geoff White and more.

Title: Spotify Box
Description: The Spotify Box acts as a middleman between the official Spotify app and a new or existing home audio system - allowing you to connect your smart phone to your audio setup and stream music throughout your house

Title: Spook.js
Description:
Spook.js is a new transient execution side channel attack which targets the Chrome web browser.
						We show that despite Google's attempts to mitigate Spectre by deploying Strict Site
							Isolation, information extraction via malicious JavaScript code is still possible in
						some cases.

Title: Optimizely Gridview Customizations
Description: One of my favorite add-ons these days is the GridView. It's pretty customizable, but some of the customizations aren't the most well documented. Here's a couple of tricks I've found handy when using it.

Title: .NET Rocks! vNext
Description: .NET Rocks! is a weekly talk show for anyone interested in programming on the Microsoft .NET platform. The shows range from introductory information to hardcore geekiness.

Title: Lab-grown meat is supposed to be inevitable. The science tells a different story.
Description: Headlines have overshadowed inconvenient truths about biology and cost. Now, new research suggests the industry may be on a crash course with reality.
